rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample space for parking and storage
Spacious entrance hall leading into the living area, designed to welcome guests.
Open-plan living room integrated with kitchen space and dining area. Adheres to Kerala style with natural ventilation and ample light.
Modern open-plan kitchen, designed with functionality and traditional Kerala aesthetics. Includes storage units and workspace.
Primary bathroom adjacent to the living area for convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed in traditional Kerala style, with a tiled threshold and carved wooden door panel.
Service/secondary exit leading to the garage or outdoor space.

notes: Design is conceptual for a bachelor pad using traditional Kerala elements within a tight budget.
The plan includes open-plan kitchen and living area as per request.
Additional rooms such as bedrooms may be integrated in upper levels or reconfigured if the budget allows.
